queries.query: INSERT INTO d_m${localChannelId} (id, server_id, received_date, processed, import_id, import_channel_id) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO d_mc${localChannelId} (metadata_id, message_id, content_type, content, data_type, is_encrypted) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE d_mc${localChannelId} SET content = ?, data_type = ?, is_encrypted = ? WHERE metadata_id = ? AND message_id = ? AND content_type = ?
INSERT INTO d_ma${localChannelId} (id, message_id, type, segment_id, size, content) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT id, sum(size) AS size FROM d_ma${localChannelId} WHERE message_id = ? GROUP BY id
SELECT type, segment_id, size, content FROM d_ma${localChannelId} WHERE id = ? ORDER BY segment_id ASC
SELECT id, type, segment_id, size, content FROM d_ma${localChannelId} WHERE message_id = ? ORDER BY id, segment_id ASC
INSERT INTO d_mm${localChannelId} (id, message_id, received_date, status, connector_name, chain_id, order_id) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE d_mm${localChannelId} SET status = ?, send_attempts = ?, send_date = ?, response_date = ? WHERE id = ? AND message_id = ?
UPDATE d_m${localChannelId} SET processed = TRUE WHERE id = ?
UPDATE d_m${localChannelId} SET processed = FALSE WHERE id = ?
SELECT channel_id, local_channel_id FROM d_channels
SELECT MAX(local_channel_id) FROM d_channels
ALTER TABLE d_mcm${localChannelId} DROP COLUMN "${columnName}"
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(id), 0) FROM d_m${localChannelId}
SELECT * FROM d_m${localChannelId} WHERE processed = FALSE AND server_id = ? ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM d_mm${localChannelId} mm JOIN d_m${localChannelId} m ON m.id = mm.message_id WHERE m.processed = FALSE AND m.server_id = ? ORDER BY m.id, mm.id
INSERT INTO d_events (event_type, channel_id, metadata_id, message_id, message_status, event_date) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT metadata_id, received, filtered, transformed, pending, sent, error FROM d_ms${localChannelId}

SELECT metadata_id, received_lifetime AS received, filtered_lifetime AS filtered, transformed_lifetime AS transformed, pending_lifetime AS pending, sent_lifetime AS sent, error_lifetime AS error FROM d_ms${localChannelId}

INSERT INTO d_ms${localChannelId} (metadata_id, received, received_lifetime, filtered, filtered_lifetime, transformed, transformed_lifetime, pending, pending_lifetime, sent, sent_lifetime, error, error_lifetime) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

UPDATE d_ms${localChannelId} SET received = received + ?, received_lifetime = received_lifetime + ?, filtered = filtered + ?, filtered_lifetime = filtered_lifetime + ?, transformed = transformed + ?, transformed_lifetime = transformed_lifetime + ?, pending = pending + ?, pending_lifetime = pending_lifetime + ?, sent = sent + ?, sent_lifetime = sent_lifetime + ?, error = error + ?, error_lifetime = error_lifetime + ?
WHERE metadata_id IS NULL

UPDATE d_ms${localChannelId} SET received = received + ?, received_lifetime = received_lifetime + ?, filtered = filtered + ?, filtered_lifetime = filtered_lifetime + ?, transformed = transformed + ?, transformed_lifetime = transformed_lifetime + ?, pending = pending + ?, pending_lifetime = pending_lifetime + ?, sent = sent + ?, sent_lifetime = sent_lifetime + ?, error = error + ?, error_lifetime = error_lifetime + ?
WHERE metadata_id = ?
TRUNCATE test_table
INSERT INTO test_table (id, string) VALUES (?, ?)
SELECT content, data_type, is_encrypted FROM d_mc${localChannelId} WHERE message_id = ? AND metadata_id = ? AND content_type = ?
SELECT * FROM d_mcm${localChannelId} WHERE message_id = ? AND metadata_id = ?
INSERT INTO d_channels (channel_id, local_channel_id) VALUES (?, ?)
INSERT INTO d_mcm${localChannelId} (METADATA_ID, MESSAGE_ID, ${metaDataColumnNames}) VALUES (?, ?, ${metaDataColumnPlaceholders})
SELECT mm.*, m.server_id FROM d_mm${localChannelId} mm JOIN d_m${localChannelId} m ON m.id = mm.message_id WHERE mm.id = ? AND mm.status = ? ORDER BY mm.message_id
SELECT mm.*, m.server_id FROM d_mm${localChannelId} mm JOIN d_m${localChannelId} m ON m.id = mm.message_id WHERE mm.id = ? AND mm.status = ? ORDER BY m.id OFFSET ? LIMIT ?
SELECT mm.*, m.server_id FROM d_mm${localChannelId} mm JOIN d_m${localChannelId} m ON m.id = mm.message_id WHERE mm.id = ? AND mm.status = ? AND m.id >= ? AND m.id <= ? ORDER BY m.id OFFSET ? LIMIT ?
SELECT mm.*, m.server_id FROM d_mm${localChannelId} mm JOIN d_m${localChannelId} m ON m.id = mm.message_id WHERE m.id = ? ORDER BY m.id

SELECT mm.*, m.server_id FROM d_mm${localChannelId} mm JOIN d_m${localChannelId} m ON m.id = mm.message_id WHERE mm.message_id = ? AND mm.id IN (${metaDataIds}) ORDER BY mm.chain_id ASC, mm.order_id ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM d_mm${localChannelId} mm JOIN d_m${localChannelId} m ON m.id = mm.message_id WHERE mm.id = ? AND mm.status = ?
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(m.id), 0) FROM d_mm${localChannelId} mm JOIN d_m${localChannelId} m ON m.id = mm.message_id WHERE mm.id = ? AND mm.status = ?
DELETE FROM d_m${localChannelId} WHERE id = ?
DELETE FROM d_mm${localChannelId} WHERE message_id = ?
DELETE FROM d_mc${localChannelId} WHERE message_id = ?
DELETE FROM d_mc${localChannelId} WHERE message_id = ? AND metadata_id = ? AND content_type = ?
DELETE FROM d_ma${localChannelId} WHERE message_id = ?
DELETE FROM d_m${localChannelId}
